comments.body: Quote from: nvortex410 on April 16, 2023, 02:41:22 AMhollow from crypto vortex come check out this crypto assets exchange on C-Patex https://c-patex.com/referral/9f5221fb-5d1f-4ef9-a014-9b7e9fe73618 been trading on here for years took a break im now back tradingand wanted say this exchange looks really good now what you guys think about c-patex exchange and there airdrops lets discus this platform in upcoming weeks referral coins code 9f5221fb-5d1f-4ef9-a014-9b7e9fe73618Latin American crypto exchange Get $10 in tokens for free!Join C-Patex Airdrop nowC-Patex is pleased to announcea MASSIVE 800 000 CPEX Airdrop!So that means you're promoting this exchange here on the forum because you've tried using it, right? And now, it has airdrops.You know when I saw these tasks that will be needed for the airdrops criteria to qualify I thought a little bit, in order to receive 10$ I need to enter money in CPEX of 20$ and I also have to pass KYC. This system is clearly a referral scheme that is not far from the Networking system or leveraging. Honestly, I'm a little disappointed and reluctant to participate in it as well. Good luck to those who try.QuoteSource : https://c-patex.com/files/en/%D0%A1PEX-Tokenomics.pdf?v=1.0

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on April 16, 2023, 07:37:38 AMLatin American crypto exchange Get $10 in tokens for free!It seems that their definition of the word free is very far from being free, as you pay your data and money as money to get something free that you may not get, and if you get it, you may not be able to withdraw the $10 or sell those tokens.In general, you are the weaker party, and the possibility of your success in obtaining that token lies in, deposit CPEX of 20$  >> passing identity verification without problems >> obtaining the token >>  enabling you to sell it >> obtaining a price of 10 dollars. Any mistake in this process means losing your money and data.Quote in order to receive 10$ I need to enter money in CPEX of 20$ and I also have to pass KYC. This system is clearly a referral scheme that is not far from the Networking system or leveraging.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on April 16, 2023, 07:37:38 AMSo that means you're promoting this exchange here on the forum because you've tried using it, right? And now, it has airdrops.It's more like OP is try to spread his referral link so even if those who registers through his link  were able to complete the task for the airdrop or not doen not really matter to Op as long as he's still going to recieve his referral bonus.I haven't clicked on the link to check out how the exchange works and with the image you provided and them requiring one to complete KYC verification I doubt if I will also take part in this referral... Sorry, airdrop event.
